mapper.select: select DISTINCT da.SERVICE_ID id ,da.SERVICE_NAME name from TB_APPLICATION_INFO info LEFT JOIN TB_SAAS s ON s.NAME = info.APP_NAME Left join TB_DAAS_APPLICATION da ON info.ID = da.APP_INFO_ID where info.status = 2 and info.RESOURCE_TYPE = 2 and s.NAME = #{name} and da.APP_KEY is not null and da.APP_SECRET is not null
